abstract.p: Tally of 57-42 roll-call on Senate vote to expand federal hate-crimes law (S)

block.p: Following is the 57-to-42 roll-call vote by which the Senate voted today to expand a federal hate-crimes law. A ''yes'' was a vote to approve to the measure. Voting ''yes'' were 44 Democrats and 13 Republicans. Voting ''no'' were 1 Democrat and 41 Republicans.

Following is the 57-to-42 roll-call vote by which the Senate voted today to expand a federal hate-crimes law. A ''yes'' was a vote to approve to the measure. Voting ''yes'' were 44 Democrats and 13 Republicans. Voting ''no'' were 1 Democrat and 41 Republicans.
